programme.title: Greek champions and children of Athens 2004 keep Olympic flame burning
programme.desc: Twelve years on, we catch up with Olympic heroes Pyrros Dimas and Ilias Iliadis, and the little girl who blew out the 2004 Olympic flame.

programme.title: Women's 1500m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 1500m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Katie LeDecky (USA) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 15:30.02 seconds, Anastasiia Kirpichnikova (FRA) took Silver, and Isabel Gose (GER) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Breaststroke was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record of 2:05.85, Zac Stubblety-Cook (AUS) took Silver and Casper Corbeau (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Zhanle Pan (CHN) claimed Gold with a new World Record time of 46.40 seconds, Kyle Chalmers (AUS) took Silver, and David Popovici (ROU) completed the podium.

programme.title: Becoming an Olympic Legend | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after his famous tally of seven Olympic gold medals and seven world records, legendary swimmer Mark Spitz makes an emotional return to Munich Olympic Park and the swimming pool, where his life was changed forever.

programme.title: Women's Trap Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Trap Finals took place on 31/07/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre. Adriana Ruano (GUA) won Gold, Silvana Stanco (ITA) won Silver, and Penny Smith (AUS) won Bronze.

programme.title: Taking Refuge (Full Length Documentary)
programme.desc: Inspired to make the world a better place through sport, three-time Olympic gold medallist Niccolo Campriani leads three refugees on a brave journey to qualify for the next Olympic Games in the Air Rifle event. Using mental and physical skills honed over years as a professional athlete, Campriani coaches and mentors Mahdi, Khaoula and Luna on a journey of learning, rediscovery and finding inner peace through the unifying power of sport. Taking Refuge follows Niccolo and his team of athletes as they set out to achieve their Olympic dream.

programme.title: Memory Lane | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after their Olympic victories in Munich, famed gymnast Olga Korbut, Germany’s long jump star Heide Rosendahl, Kenya’s long-distance running hero Kip Keino and Great Britain’s celebrated pentathlete Mary Peters make an emotional return to the scene of their gold medal wins.

programme.title: Men's 4x200m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x200m Freestyle was held on 30/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Great Britain claimed the Gold with a time of 6:59.43, The United States of America took Silver and Australia completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's Qualification Subdivision 1 | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Men's Qualification Subdivision 1 took place on 27/07/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Includes 6 Rotations and 6 discipline: Floor Exercise, Pommel Horse, Rings, Vault, Parallel Bars, Horizontal Bar.

programme.title: Can Russia’s rhythmic gymnast Margarita Mamun transform this Z Team?
programme.desc: Olympic gold medalist Margarita Mamun tries to turn around the fortunes of Moscow’s Pirouette Gymnastics team. Is one week enough?

programme.title: Men's Qualification Subdivision 2 | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Men's Qualification Subdivision 2 took place on 27/07/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Includes 6 Rotations and 6 discipline: Floor Exercise, Pommel Horse, Rings, Vault, Parallel Bars, Horizontal Bar.

programme.title: Men's Qualification Subdivision 3 | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Men's Qualification Subdivision 3 took place on 27/07/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Includes 6 Rotations and 6 discipline: Floor Exercise, Pommel Horse, Rings, Vault, Parallel Bars, Horizontal Bar

programme.title: Viktoriia: Ukraine’s Gymnastics Hope
programme.desc: As the bombs dropped in her hometown of Kyiv and her father left home to fight in the war, Ukrainian rhythmic gymnast Viktoriia Onopriienko battled daily to make her dream – competing in Paris 2024 – come true. This documentary showcases her grit, resilience and determination in her inspiring journey to compete at the Olympic Games. Discover the indomitable spirit of this young athlete as she prepares to represent Ukraine on the world stage.

programme.title: Women's Team Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Team Final took place at the Bercy Arena, Paris, on 30/07/24. The United States of America won Gold, Italy won Silver and the Brazil finished the podium.

programme.title: Shakti: India’s Super Women
programme.desc: The inspiring stories of four top Indian female athletes who have faced unmatched obstacles in order to triumph at the high levels. Shakti features wrestler Sakshi Malik, gymnast Dipa Karmakar, karateka Sandhya Shetty and archer Deepika Kumari. Watch Now”

programme.title: Women's Individual All-Around Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Individual All-Around Final took place at Bercy Arena on 01/08/2024. Simone Biles won Gold (USA), Rebeca Andrade Silver (BRA) and Sunisa Lee (USA) Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Bryony Page (GBR) claimed Gold, Viyaleta Bardzilouskaya (AIN) took Silver and Sophiane Methot (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: The Bryony Page story (extended version)
programme.desc: Bryony Page had to overcome an extraordinary mental obstacle on her way to becoming Team GB’s first ever Olympic trampoline medallist.

programme.title: Individual All-Around Qualification - Morning | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Individual All-Around Qualification took place at Porte de La Chapelle Arena on 08/08/24.

programme.title: Group All-Around Final | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Group All-Around Final which took place at the Porte de La Chapelle Arena, France, on the 10/08/24. The People´s Republic of China claimed Gold, Israel took Silver and Italy completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's Qualification Subdivisions 3 | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Subdivisions 3 Qualification for Artistic Gymnastics took place on 28/07/2024 at the Bercy Arena.

programme.title: Spain’s “Las Niñas de Oro” (extended)
programme.desc: “Las Niñas de Oro” were the youngest Spanish Olympic medallist when they won gold in Atlanta 1996. They continue to inspire younger generations, including the Rio 2016 silver medallist Spanish national team.

programme.title: The Magnificent 7, USA Women's Soccer, and Atlanta's enduring Olympic legacy
programme.desc: Twenty years on, we relish in Magnificent 7’s legacy with Shannon Miller and Kyla Ross, and remember the miracle birth of Centennial Park.

programme.title: Women's Qualification Subdivisions 4 | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Subdivisions 4 Qualification for Artistic Gymnastics took place on 28/07/2024 at the Bercy Arena.

programme.title: Women's Qualification Subdivision 5 | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Subdivisions 5 Qualification for Artistic Gymnastics took place on 28/07/2024 at the Bercy Arena.

programme.title: After Li Ning: The new age of Chinese Olympian entrepreneurs
programme.desc: Beyond gold medals, Beijing 2008 left Chinese Olympians with millions of social media followers and many innovative sports business ideas.

programme.title: Erika Fasana Cooks with Chef Chicco Cerea
programme.desc: Italian artistic gymnast Erika Fasana meets in Brusaporto the local chef Chicco Cerea to prepare a delicious Carpaccio.

programme.title: Men's Team Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Team Final took place at the Bercy Arena, Paris, on 29/07/24. Team Japan won Gold, People's Republic of China won Silver, and the United States of America finished the podium.

programme.title: Can anyone keep up with the gymnastics workout of phenom Laurie Hernandez?
programme.desc: Fitness duo Austin and Julian try training with U.S. Olympic gold medallist Laurie Hernandez at her hometown gym.

programme.title: Men's Individual All-Around Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's All-Around Artistic Gymnastics Final took place on 31/07/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Shinnosuke Oka (JPN) claimed the Gold, Boheng Zhang (CHN) took the Silver, and Ruoteng Xiao (CHN) the Bronze.

programme.title: Men's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Ivan Litvinovich (AIN) claimed Gold, Zisai Wang (CHN) took Silver and Langyu Yan (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Competition Season
programme.desc: Morgan and Angelina attempt to handle the pressure of the world stage. Will they succeed? Yile has a point to prove in training.

programme.title: Romania’s Nadia Comaneci (extended)
programme.desc: Romania’s Nadia Comaneci scored the first perfect 10 in gymnastics but is finding a new thrill coaching and helping people in her homeland

programme.title: Individual All-Around Qualification - Afternoon | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Individual All-Around Qualification took place at Porte de La Chapelle Arena on 08/08/24.
